name: Rolls of Dice to Flesh: Space Edition
name_original: Rolls of Dice to Flesh: Space Edition
description:
App version of a semi-interactive novel about outer space weightgain.

Original version (need a D6): https://www.deviantart.com/thefatnesswithinyou/art/Rolls-of-Dice-to-Flesh-Space-...

Original Writer: https://www.deviantart.com/thefatnesswithinyou

Developped by https://www.deviantart.com/atlya
Using Unity 2019 with Fungus
